name: Zradca
content:
Zradca was a Kowakian monkey-lizard who worked with Lena Freemaker in the Ring of Kafrene. Whe the Galactic Empire was looking for the Wookiee Chewbacca, Radka turned Lena and Chewbacca over to the Galactic Empire. The Kowakian monkey-lizard had green skin and purple hair.
A Kowakian monkey-lizard bounty hunter turning Chewbacca over to the Empire was first mentioned in the 2018 junior novelization of the film Solo: A Star Wars Story. Zradca made its first appearance in the non-canon television series LEGO Star Wars: All-Stars, although there's no mention of being a Bounty hunter.
